data.name: Visited Hyperlinks
data.description:
Default colour is set to Green, if you wanted to change your own colour , follow the instructions below :)



Install
Click on Stylish
Open installed 
Find this "Visited Hyperlinks"
Click the pencil (edit)
Change "green" to any other colour, red, purple, blue ect 
Click save at top right
